settings.heading: Details
settings.content:
• Exclusive hidden editions
  • Customizable and detachable armor
  • Quick assembly & high articulation
  • Battle card gameplay
  • Display-ready quality
  • Genuine license limited edition

Clash of Gods combines fast assembly, cultural detail, and collectible quality. Each figure boasts customizable armor, epic mounts, and a unique battle card system. With 17 points of articulation and rare hidden editions, it’s perfect for fans who love mystery, action, and strategy. Ideal for ages 9+, it’s a thrilling experience of myth and adventure.

settings.heading: Shopping Tips
settings.content:
Complete Set Purchase: Each suprise figurine in the set is unique, ensuring a diverse collection without duplicates.

Single Suprise Purchase: Purchasing suprise figurines individually may result in receiving duplicate figures.

settings.heading: Shipping Terms
settings.content:
Orders in stock are usually shipped within the United State within 2-7 business days. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to the email address attached to the order once the order has shipped. 

Please Note: International shipping is not currently available.

settings.heading: Product Care
settings.content:
Suprise Rules:

  1. For individuals aged 9 and above, please purchase suprise products under the supervision of a guardian. Kids under the age of 9 are not advised to make purchases.
  2. The packaging for these products contains small parts; do not swallow them, and do not allow kids under 3 years of age to use these toys.
  3. Suprise products are unique and random. Once opened, they cannot be returned or exchanged.

settings.heading: Return
settings.content:
You can return your Blokees order within 30 days of receipt. Please make sure the collectibles you received are in unused condition with the tags and packaging intact. If you've opened the toy it can not be returned. Start your return by emailing us at service@blokees.com.. Upon receiving and inspecting your item, a refund will be processed within 10 business days according to the original method of payment.

Please Note:

  1. Custom items, sale goods, and gift cards are non-returnable.
  2. Blokees only supports company products sold from authorized sellers in the US and the company websites.

settings.heading: Help Center
settings.content: To contact Blokees' customer service department, please email service@blokees.com or fill out the form on the contact page.

settings.heading: Packaging Contents
settings.content:
Suprise Set Box Composition: 9 Hero Infinity Blokees Figures (may have three special figures)

  • Hero Infinity Figure x 9
  • Weapon Accessory / Poseable Gesture (depends on the Figures)
  • Display Stand x 9
  • Card x 9
  • Armor x 9
  • Instruction Manual x 1
  • Hero Duel Comics x 9

settings.text: With 1500w ebike conversion kit, Its affordability, and versatility, You can turn the bike you love electric at a fraction of the cost of an eBike, for all your all-terrain adventures.

settings.icon_2_text: Package Size: 72*72*120 mm (Single Box), 220*220*125 mm (Set Box)

settings.heading: Detail
settings.content:
Dive into the Transformers universe with Blokees Figures Galaxy Version 05 ONE! This collection brings the origins story to life with 9 iconic characters from the "Transformers: One" movie. Each figure features an impressive 20+ points of articulation, allowing for incredibly dynamic poses and endless play possibilities.

What makes this set truly special? First, the surprise factor - hunt for the rare metallic Optimus Prime, hidden at a 1:36 ratio! Plus, each character comes with interchangeable accessories and weapons, letting you customize your display or battle scenes.

We're constantly improving playability, with new features added in each iteration. Whether you're recreating movie moments or imagining new adventures, these highly detailed figures offer both hardcore fans and newcomers an exciting way to experience the birth of the Autobot-Decepticon conflict.

settings.block_text: Each sealed box holds a surprise - collect rare Galaxy (1/108), Golden (1/54), and Silver (1/27) figures. No duplicates in complete set.
Premium 7.5cm figures with rare Galaxy (1/108), Golden (1/54), and Silver (1/27) variants. Genuine licensed limited edition with no duplicates per box set.
Rock-Paper-Scissors card battles with surprise dual-attribute characters and hidden abilities. Official character-specific weapons and removable armor.
Two legendary mounts - Divine Kirin and Flying Sands, officially designed for all characters with mystical transformation features.
17 moving parts for great poses, easy 2-3 minute assembly, made with strong materials that last.
Create your own hero look by switching armor pieces. Official limited edition with special surprise features.

settings.heading: Epic Legends Unbound: Clash of Gods
settings.text: Unleash rare hidden figures, powerful armor, and divine mounts as you enter the battle of a lifetime.

settings.title: Playability Unleashed!
settings.left_item_title: 17 points of articulation for extreme poses!
settings.right_item_title: Authentic Chinese Armor, Removable and poseable armor pieces!
settings.bottom_right_title: Movable Chest & Skirt Armor for maximum customization!

settings.title: Surprise Feature!
settings.left_item_title: Divine Kirin, K.O All Who Dare Defy!
settings.right_item_title: All Galaxy Edition Turbo figures can be paired with the Divine Kirin and Flying Sands mounts! Collect them all!

settings.title: Intense Battles, Hero Story Reimagined
settings.desc: The epic saga continues! Now with 9 new comic chapters that bring these legendary heroes to life.

settings.title: Basic Rules
settings.text_1:
1. Each hero has one attribute: Rock, Paper, or Scissors
  2. Each player needs 3+ heroes (no duplicates)
  3. Place your heroes face-up in front of you

settings.title: How to Play
settings.text_1:
1. Players do Rock-Paper-Scissors
  2. Winner chooses any hero (their own or opponent's) to enter battle
  3. Heroes battle using their Rock-Paper-Scissors attributes
settings.text_2:
4. Win = 2 points, Draw = 1 point each

5. Each hero can battle only once

6. Game ends when one player has no heroes left

7. Highest score wins

settings.title: Special Heroes
settings.text_1:
Mythical Aspect Heroes:

  • It has two attributes (Rock/Paper, Paper/Scissors, or Rock/Scissors)
  • Can flip once per battle to change attribute
  • Must choose one attribute before battle

settings.title: Creation Heroes
settings.text_1:
• Can combine with other heroes
  • Combining heroes earns 1 bonus point
  • Combined hero uses new card's attribute

settings.title: Hero Battle Card Game - Quick Rules
settings.sub_title: The More Cards You Collect, the Greater the Adventure!

settings.block_text: Discover Galaxy, Golden, and Silver hidden editions, each adding rarity and excitement to your collection.
With 17 articulation points, each figure allows for diverse and lifelike poses, bringing each hero’s story to life.
Fast 2-3 minute assembly means less setup and more time for action-packed adventures.
Customize each hero with unique, removable armor inspired by ancient designs, creating endless options for roleplay.
Engage in rock-paper-scissors battles with special cards, featuring dual attributes that add strategy and depth to gameplay.
Equip any hero with Divine Kirin or Flying Sands mounts, adding power and versatility to the battlefield.
Each hero and artifact comes with a unique backstory inspired by classic legends, enhancing the play and display experience.
Premium, high-quality ABS materials ensure each limited-edition figure is durable and collectible, perfect for serious fans and newcomers alike.

settings.heading: Collect & Battle: Chinese Warrior Action Figures
settings.text: Premium collectible figures with removable armor, mount companions & battle card system. Find rare Galaxy variants.

settings.content_text: I was expecting a regular collectible, but these figures are incredible! The quality of the material, the armor details, and especially the hidden characters make it an adventure each time I open one. Divine Kirin was a lucky find!

I got these for my son, but we all got into the unboxing excitement! The Rock-Paper-Scissors game cards add another layer, so it’s more than just collecting. He’s obsessed with the mounts, and I have to admit, they’re pretty cool.
The armor you can take on and off is awesome, and it’s surprisingly sturdy. I’ve collected a few different characters, but it’s hard to find the rare ones—still, that makes it more exciting.

This series has everything a collector could want: unique characters, detailed lore, and the chance to find those rare editions. I can’t wait for the next release! The quality is solid, and they’re easy to pose for display.

I was drawn to the Chinese myth-inspired designs, and I’m not disappointed. Each figure feels thoughtfully made. My favorite so far is Sun Wukong. Really pleased with the quality—this will look great in my display collection!

I really like that there’s a game aspect with the Rock-Paper-Scissors cards, which makes them more than just display items. The mounts are a great addition too. If I could find more of the Galaxy Hidden editions, it would be a solid 5 stars!

I’m a sucker for collectible blind boxes, and these have been my favorite so far. The designs and quality exceeded my expectations, and each unboxing feels like a mini adventure. Can’t wait to add more to my collection.
Bought a few of these for my daughter, and she loves them. The assembly is easy enough for her to do on her own, and the figures are durable. Only wish it was easier to find the hidden variants!

I bought a few of these on a whim, and they look fantastic on my desk. The poses are fun to set up, and each character has a unique look. It’s tough to find the rare ones, but that’s what keeps me coming back.
From the detailed armor to the impressive articulation, these figures have won me over. Each one feels unique, and I love the mythological theme.

settings.video_title_host: The Transformers of Fractured Space-Time?! Blokees Galaxy Version 04 Unboxings

settings.block_title: What is Hero Infinity Galaxy Version Turbo 04 | Clash of Gods?
settings.block_text:
It's a collectible figure series based on Chinese mythology and history, featuring detailed 7.5cm articulated figures with removable armor. Each figure comes with a character card for a strategic Rock-Paper-Scissors battle game.
This series introduces the "Clash of Gods" theme, focusing on legendary conflicts and powerful deities. Collect all the heroes, including ultra-rare variants, and equip them with the Divine Kirin and Flying Sands mounts!
Unique features: Intricate sculpting, high articulation (17 points), authentic Chinese armor, rare variants (Galaxy 1/108, Golden 1/54, Silver 1/27), removable armor, and mount compatibility.

settings.block_title: How many figures are in a complete set, including variants?
settings.block_text: A standard display box contains nine unique, non-duplicate hero figures. However, the complete set includes these nine regular figures plus three hidden variant figures (Silver, Golden, and Galaxy), bringing the total to 12 unique figures to collect.

settings.block_title: How does the Rock-Paper-Scissors battle system work, including special rules?
settings.block_text:
• Gameplay: Figures have Rock, Paper, or Scissors attributes. Players choose figures and reveal them simultaneously. Standard RPS rules apply.
  • Mythical Figures: Two attributes, switchable once per battle.
  • Artifacts (Mounts): Equip to figures, modify attributes, grant bonus points.

settings.block_title: What are the Divine Kirin and Flying Sands mounts, and how are they used in gameplay?
settings.block_text: The Divine Kirin and Flying Sands are two artifact figures that represent powerful mounts. All figures in the series are compatible with these mounts. When equipped, the mount's attribute is added to the hero's attribute for battle.

settings.block_title: What is the recommended age range for these figures, and why?
settings.block_text: The recommended age range is 9+ years due to the small parts which pose a choking hazard for younger children. The strategic card game also requires a certain level of cognitive development and understanding of game rules.

settings.block_title: What are the figures made of, and are they safe for children?
settings.block_text: The figures are primarily made of ABS plastic, a durable and generally safe material for toys. They are tested to meet international safety standards. However, adult supervision is always recommended for younger children due to the presence of small parts.

settings.block_title: How are the figures assembled, and how long does it take?
settings.block_text: The figures are designed for quick and intuitive assembly. Most figures can be assembled in approximately 2-3 minutes without requiring any tools or glue. Clear instructions are included.

settings.block_title: What if there's a quality issue with my figure?
settings.block_text: Please contact our customer support team, and we'll be happy to assist you.

settings.block_title: When will single Hero Infinity figures figures be sold separately?
settings.block_text: Currently, we offer the 9-figure Surprise Set Box. We're exploring different options for future releases and will announce any updates as soon as we can. Stay tuned for Blokees!

settings.heading: Assemble and battle!
settings.context: Articulated Chinese hero figures with removable armor and strategic card gameplay. Discover hidden gems!

settings.heading: Detailed Manual
settings.context: We've included an easy-to-follow manual with your Blokees set. Find it in the product details section for all the tips and tricks you'll need.
